name: eggd_bclconvert
title: eggd_bclconvert
summary: Converts Illumina data from BCL to FASTQ using bclconvert

inputSpec.name: upload_sentinel_record
inputSpec.label: Incremental upload sentinel record
inputSpec.help: The sentinel record produced by dx-streaming-upload

inputSpec.name: run_archive
inputSpec.label: Archive of top level run folder
inputSpec.help: One archived file containing the top level output from the run. This archive should contain RunInfo.xml and be named the same as the original file.

inputSpec.name: sample_sheet
inputSpec.label: Sample sheet
inputSpec.help: The sample sheet file in CSV format. If specified, will override any samplesheets present in the run data.

inputSpec.name: advanced_opts
inputSpec.label: Advanced options
inputSpec.help: Additional command-line options to be passed verbatim to the invocation of bclconvert.

outputSpec.name: output_files
outputSpec.label: All files (except bcls) from the sequencer after demultiplexing
outputSpec.help: An array of files with run statistics
